content.description: One of the better routes in the Rasmussen West area.  Find the crimper and sloper/crimper on the lip of the roof.  4 or 5 fun moves, then you're done :)
content.protection: You'll probably want a pad as the landing for this one has a few giant logs at the bottom that you could impale  yourself on if you fell right.
content.location: This route starts on the right side of the toad's cheek, just before the overhang stops.  Look for a left hand crimper and a right hand sloper/crimper - both just on the lip of the overhang.  Start with your feet down low on the choss below.  Climb straight up!

content.description: Follow the crack all the way up using only the crack. Fist jams with a few hand jambs. V1 if you end up using the holds to the sides of the crack.
content.location: The boulder just left of the boulder with Pete’s dihedral. Go past Anything But and you’ll see it.

content.description:
Hand jambs, finger jambs, layback flakes, drop knees, heel hooks, dynos... you can utilize any combination of these unnecessary moves to send Peter's Dihedral.   

  Necessity is the mother of invention, it is true -- but it's father is creativity.   - Jonathan Schattke
content.location: Approximately 20 feet to the right of Toad.

content.description:
2 variations:   Big moves up the right arete, topping out straight up (recommended).   Or easier climbing up the left arete through worse rock. 

  The crux of this route is the head game.
content.protection: Spotters recommended.  If you blow it at the top you will probably get hurt rolling down the hill.
content.location: This is the longest and proudest line in the area - straight up the obvious line that faces the trail.

content.description: Start on the face and traverse left, then follow the nose all the way up.
content.location: Just left of the boulder with Pete’s Dihedral

content.description: This is the typical Mankato rock, but it is all decently weathered so it doesn't break (most of the time).  Some good problems and some insanely contrived things if you are bored :)
